title: New: Blooms – If I
body:
[Blooms](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/24490-new-blooms-skin/) originally surfaced back in April ’13, perhaps intentionally shrouded in mystery, and carrying their debut track, _Skin_. Now, several months down the line and **Louise Cunnane** has revealed both her identity, and her second track, the yearning, slow-dance worthy, _If I_. Calling in Irish producer Sacred Animals, it’s part BANKS, part Björk; it demands repeat listens, and will no doubt earn then.
